actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the project for the Fort Peck Dam, Montana, to require the Secretary of the Army to repave, upgrade, and extend the roads which provide access to Fort Peck Lake.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to carry out certain road maintenance activities on access roads to Fort Peck Dam, Montana.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project for the Fort Peck Dam, Montana, to require the Secretary of the Army to repave, upgrade, and extend the roads which provide access to Fort Peck Lake.
